entry.title: Red Between the Lines
entry.summary:
Author: kimismiki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,332Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Peter Ve, 'Pete' is currently interning in the Fashion Design world, operating out of a worn-down studio in The Hill. He couldn't afford something nicer in the Fashion District, so this will just have to suffice—even if the AC is broken. He spends his time either working by repairing clothes brought to him, or even sometimes, a vigilante's clothes once in a while. I mean, with all that crime and fighting, a scratch or a rip will happen from time to time. Peter takes a break from his recent collection he is working on, and stops at his favorite Spot in Gotham, the "Spot Coff", and finds himself intrigued with a man he's never seen before—especially someone that has a white streak coming out of the middle of his hair, and a weird scar on his cheek, that yeah, you guessed it—he hasn't seen before either.

entry.title: MIDNIGHT CHRONICLES: Cursed Souls
entry.summary:
Author: strangenight (strangerlets)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,174Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Strange cases begin to spread across Gotham, and not even Batman can explain what's happening. With John Constantine unable to help - and very reluctant - he ends up pointing to someone who should never have gotten involved. But as the city descends into chaos, Batman and his family learn that some monsters don't live in the shadows… they live within us.

Author: Cinnbar_Bun

Summary: October is upon us, and with that, comes a month of tricks and treats galore! My current fixation at the moment is the Batman franchise so I've listed some of the characters chosen and their prompts. Prompts were decided by me using a mix of prompt lists, but I kept lots of empty days to take requests for characters and kinks :) Also these are generally more wholesome/nicer kinds of smut/intimacy because that's my preference I'm not completely into violent smut.These are all x Readers and will generally use an F! or AFAB! entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: bloodbythemiddleeast (laptopsocks)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,941Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 332

Summary: There’s almost something unsettling about how that moves you—how Jason’s character could be cracked open by a single Jane Austen line, buried in the pages of a book he keeps within reach. It softens him, grinds the edges of his form in your memory, sands the grit from his words in your hand, and you think this living arrangement might not be too bad after all. What’s so bad about a big man reading a little bit of Jane Austen, anyway? In which your roommate keeps arriving home bloodied and bruised, stubborn and a little cruel. Good thing he knows how to fuck.

entry.title: The House hunger built
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,509Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 234

Summary: "Of course I eat people, I mean...It's not something I would broadcast since it's...well Gotham and they began to make a phad about it because the citizens are brilliantly...stupid."Bodies are piling up, whatever is left. Families; different backgrounds, different ethnics, religions, looks are being eaten and whatever is left into a master piece. Some sort of art with the remains and everyone was losing time and leads to find out who has been feasting upon Gotham citizens. Jason however, knew of a Cannibal that he totally never mentioned to Bruce. It's not Jason's fault he died before revealing his darkest discovery and that discovery is in the form of a boy he had left behind. [M/N] [L/N]; Mortitan, brilliant, a chef of his own making and conisear of flesh.All Jason needed to do is sweeten the deal in a way that drives all people, after all at the end of the day {M/N] is human after all."Besides..it's people...they are literally born every day..so who cares if a few of them...just disapear once in a while?"

entry.title: Afterlife's Anonymous
entry.summary:
Author: wolfzstar777

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,552Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Jason Todd’s back from the dead — not that she knows that. All she knows is some random “Mystery Man” keeps texting her, saying the sweetest (and sometimes snarkiest) things, and leaving flowers at her door with the goofiest little notes attached.He knows way too much about her, compliments her like it’s his job, and somehow manages to be both annoying and charming at the same time.She’s convinced he’s some weirdo with a crush. He’s just trying to figure out how to tell her the truth — that her “Mystery Man” is the guy she thought she lost forever.
